---
id: QueryCurrentPendingOrder
title: Query the Current Pending Order
sidebar_label: Query the Current Pending Order
sidebar_position: 7
description: /spot/v4/open-order
---

**Type:** GET

**Description:** `/spot/v4/open-order`

### Limit Flow Rules

10/s/apikey

### Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `symbol` | string | No |  | Trading pair, if not filled in, represents all |
| `bizType` | string | No |  | SPOT, LEVER |
| `side` | string | No |  | BUY, SELL |

### Response Example

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": [
    {
      "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
      "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
      "clientOrderId": "16559590087220001",
      "baseCurrency": "string",
      "quoteCurrency": "string",
      "side": "BUY",
      "type": "LIMIT",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "price": "40000",
      "origQty": "2",
      "origQuoteQty": "48000",
      "executedQty": "1.2",
      "leavingQty": "string",
      "tradeBase": "2",
      "tradeQuote": "48000",
      "avgPrice": "42350",
      "fee": "string",
      "feeCurrency": "string",
      "state": "NEW",
      "time": 1655958915583,
      "updatedTime": 1655958915583
    }
  ]
}
```
